actions.description: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

specialTraits.description: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.
specialTraits.name: Bad Flier
